alert.note: Alert for Curry; Quay (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 3:31PM MDT until May 23 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Quay County in east central New Mexico... Northeastern Curry County in east central New Mexico... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 331 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Wheatland, or 17 miles southeast of Tucumcari, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... San Jon, Grady, Broadview, Wheatland, Bellview and Bard. This includes Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 352 and 364. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
